name: emogeez-generator
description: Build an emojis sprite and stylesheet file from emojis datas collected from both emojipedia.org and unicode.org website

scripts.prepublish: yarn run transpile && yarn run test
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test TEMP_FILES_PATH=tests/tmp nyc --check-coverage --lines 85 --report-dir=${CIRCLE_ARTIFACTS:-'./nyc-reports'} --reporter=lcov yarn run mocha
scripts.test: yarn run lint:js --quiet && yarn run coverage
scripts.mocha: NODE_ENV=test TEMP_FILES_PATH=tests/tmp mocha --compilers js:babel-register -r tests/bootstrap.js --timeout 5000 -r babel-polyfill $(find lib -name '*.test.js')

author: Arthur FÃ©ral, iAdvize<arthur.feral@hotmail.fr>
